heisigStory: A sail made of a towel makes a mediocre vessel.
koohiiStory1: When stranded at sea, we needed a Sail. The best we had was a TOWEL, which was MEDICORE, only catching a DROP of WIND.
koohiiStory2: A towel makes a mediocre sail.
myStory: chèo thuyền. khăn tay bình thường dùng để chèo thuyền. khăn làm cánh buồm cho người dân thường chèo thuyền
